content.rendered:
Monday, March 3rd, 2025 

Today is a “C” Day 

 

Club Meetings and Information 

 Any 7th or 8th grade boy interested in playing tennis this spring should attend a brief informational and sign-up meeting on Monday March 3rd in the small gym. If you cannot attend, please see Coach Nizzi for APP and practice information. 

Attention all 7th & 8th grade girls interested in joining the Outdoor Track & Field team! There will be an informational meeting in room 269 after school on Monday, March 3rd. Everyone competes and there are no cuts!! See Ms. Grolley for more information. 

There will be NO knitting club on Monday, March 3. We will meet again on March 10th. 

Maple Ave’s Dodgeball tournament will be held on Friday March 14 from 5:45-8:45 pm in Maple’s main gym. Sign up forms are located outside of the cafeteria and outside of room F180. Please only have one of your teammates grab one. Signups will take place before block 1 (on your way in the building) outside the cafeteria next Monday through Wednesday, March 10, 11, and 12. Students will need to come to signups with 1 completed roster and $30 ($3 signup fee per player). Only 1 student needs to come with the form and money. Adults and non-playing students are welcome to come watch, and the cost is $5 for them to get in. 

There will be no chamber orchestra rehearsal after school today – Monday 3/3. 

Science Placement Testing will occur block 1 on Wednesday, March 5. All students should report to their Block 1 class for attendance FIRST before heading to their testing location. 7th grade students will be testing in the LGI. 6th Grade Students from RED and HATHORN will be testing in Cafeteria 1. 6th Grade Students from EXCELSIOR and COLUMBIAN will be testing in Cafeteria 2. All students need to bring their charged device, a pencil, and a calculator. 

Attention Pop Culture Icon Club – we are meeting on Wednesday after school in the Large Group Room. Please let Ms. Schnorr know if you need a late bus pass. See you there! 

Any 7th and 8th girls interested in playing modified lacrosse this spring should attend the informational meeting on Monday, March 10th in the small gym, Gym F after school. 

Bagpiping club will meet today (Monday) in P222. 

There is a student council meeting on Wednesday in Mrs. Kerls room 

 

  • Today’s lunch selections are… Chicken nuggets, seasoned pasta, broccoli, cucumbers and dip. 

 

Check out the Maple Avenue Club Calendar for club meetings and room information! 
As always, BE SAFE, BE RESPECTFUL, BE RESPONSIBLE, BE KIND!  

Make it a great day, or not…the choice is yours.
